name: MuddyShoes (Chess)
description:
As you move the pieces, any squares you traverse will be repainted to match your pieces colors. A piece can only move onto a square that is painted their own color, or to an enemy square when capturing. When you capture an enemy piece all squares the captured piece could have moved to will be painted your color.

Left click to select piece, right click to deselect.

Most standard chess rules apply, except for the following; pawns only move and capture forward, you may place yourself in check, you cannot castle, and there is no en-passant or pawn promotion.

The game ends when the king is captured, there is no automatic check mate.

Paint the board! Control the most space! Defeat your opponent! (Have fun!)
